title:
How can I look up The Star News  paper  online for 2/14/2011  relating to the (Couple are Valentines for life? 

Thanks,

Peggy Hill
text:
Here's a link to the story at StarNewsOnline.com:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110214/ARTICLES/110219854/-1/archive?Title=Valentines-of-65-years-credit-faith-hard-work
